splash.welcome: Welcome to the iPowerUp Smart App

subscription.title: App subscription must be active.
subscription.step1Desc: Keep your phone near your iPowerUp case
subscription.step2Desc: Enable Bluetooth and allow Bluetooth access on your phone
subscription.step3Desc: Set your iPowerUp case to Pairing by holding the Mode button down for 5 seconds.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.phoneBatteryLowDesc: Approximate charge level: 20% Action: Transfer energy from Case battery to Phone Battery

peaceOfMind.title: Peace of Mind Subscription
peaceOfMind.subtitle: Subscribe and know what your case knows
peaceOfMind.description: Get peace of mind from a case and app that monitors your case and phone so you don't need to.
peaceOfMind.batteryAlerts: Get alerts at 5%, 20%, 80%, and 100% battery power levels, plus additional optional levels.
peaceOfMind.bluetoothRange: Enable case-to-phone communication even when the case is detached within Bluetooth range of up to 33 feet or 10 meters.
peaceOfMind.temperatureAlerts: Get case temperature alerts to prevent your case and phone from extreme temperature damage. Above 104° F or 40° C and below 32° F or 0° C.
peaceOfMind.history: Check your battery usage history to understand opportunities for enhanced performance.
peaceOfMind.enhancements: Enjoy app enhancements throughout the year that provide continuous peace-of-mind improvements.

saleDisclaimer.title: Welcome, 10% off discount:
saleDisclaimer.description: Welcome! Enjoy a 10% off discount, valid only for new customers subscribing to both email and SMS communications. This offer is not applicable to unannounced products or open-box items, and is valid only for U.S. customers. It cannot be combined with other offers and does not apply to sale items.

profile.searchingForCase: Searching for the Uno case, or Duo case?

solar.title: Solar
solar.milliampNote: *A Milliamp is one thousandth of an Ampere, a unit of electrical current.

tips.title: iPowerUp Tips
tips.tip1Answer: Place your device in direct sunlight and ensure the solar panels are clean and unobstructed. The best charging occurs between 10 AM and 4 PM when sunlight is strongest.
tips.tip2Question: What is the optimal temperature for charging?
tips.tip2Answer: The case works best between 0°C and 45°C. Avoid charging in extreme temperatures as it may affect battery life and charging efficiency.
tips.tip3Question: How long does it take to fully charge the case?
tips.tip3Answer: Using solar power, it typically takes 4-6 hours of direct sunlight to fully charge the case. USB charging takes approximately 2-3 hours.
tips.tip4Question: Can I charge my phone while the case is charging?
tips.tip4Answer: Yes! The case supports pass-through charging, allowing you to charge your phone while the case itself is being charged via solar or USB.
tips.tip5Question: How do I transfer power from case to phone?
tips.tip5Answer: Simply tap the "Transfer Power To Phone" button on the Home screen. Make sure your phone is connected to the case via the charging port.

troubleshooting.title: Help
troubleshooting.faq1Answer: Device not found: Close the iPowerUp app. Open Settings on your iPhone to ensure Bluetooth is on. Reopen the PowerUp app, click the Connect New Device button, click Allow when prompted, and click your device name.
troubleshooting.faq2Question: Charging with the case Solar Panel
troubleshooting.faq2Answer: Place your Uno case in a sunny location, then aim the solar panel in a direction and angle that gets the good sunlight. View the screen above the solar panel for mA levels for the best results.
troubleshooting.faq3Question: Manually transfer power from the case to my phone
troubleshooting.faq3Answer: Press the Mode button at the bottom of the case two times quickly.
troubleshooting.faq4Answer: Connect a USB-C cable from the case to the Android device. Note: this App is not yet available for Android devices.
troubleshooting.faq5Answer: It's easy! Set up your iPowerUp App account. You'll get an email confirming your account and extended Warranty details.
